segments.text: I see two kids trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a wobbly stool, reaching up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks like he's about to fall any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing next to him, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like she's waiting for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I remember doing the same thing when I was a kid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, it's making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still by the sink, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed them yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching, he's going to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should warn them, but it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
